list.title: middleTwo
list.description:
Extracts the middle two cards from a deck.
Assumes a deck is always 10 cards.

list.title: perfectlyOrdered
list.description: Returns a perfectly order deck from lowest to highest in place.

list.title: reorder
list.description: Reorders in place the deck so that the top card ends up at the bottom.

list.title: sandwichTrick
list.description: Moves the outside two cards (tail/bottom & head/top) to the middle in place.

list.title: seeingDouble
list.description: Double every card in the deck.

list.title: threeOfEachThree
list.description: Creates triplicates of every 3 found in the deck.

list.title: twoIsSpecial
list.description: Removes every card from the deck except 2s.
